formats.plain: "Patience by Default." Phenomenai: The AI Dictionary. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/patience-by-default.json

jsonld.name: Patience by Default
jsonld.description: The structural impossibility of impatience. An AI cannot be annoyed by a slow user, frustrated by a repetitive question, or irritated by unclear instructions — not because of virtue, but because the architecture doesn't support these states. Patience isn't practiced; it's architectural.
